title: Support for NVIDIA Video Loader (nvvl)
body_html:
System information

  • Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in TensorFlow): No
  • OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04): Linux Ubuntu 16.04
  • Mobile device (e.g. iPhone 8, Pixel 2, Samsung Galaxy) if the issue happens on mobile device: N/A
  • TensorFlow installed from (source or binary): binary
  • TensorFlow version (use command below): 1.10
  • Python version: 2.7
  • Bazel version (if compiling from source): N/A
  • GCC/Compiler version (if compiling from source): N/A
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.0
  • GPU model and memory: GTX 980M 4G
  • Exact command to reproduce: N/A

Could you add the support for NVIDIA Video Loader?

body:
### System information
- **Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in TensorFlow)**: No
- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**: Linux Ubuntu 16.04
- **Mobile device (e.g. iPhone 8, Pixel 2, Samsung Galaxy) if the issue happens on mobile device**: N/A
- **TensorFlow installed from (source or binary)**: binary
- **TensorFlow version (use command below)**: 1.10
- **Python version**: 2.7
- **Bazel version (if compiling from source)**: N/A
- **GCC/Compiler version (if compiling from source)**: N/A
- **CUDA/cuDNN version**: 9.0
- **GPU model and memory**: GTX 980M 4G
- **Exact command to reproduce**: N/A

Could you add the support for [NVIDIA Video Loader](https://github.com/NVIDIA/nvvl)?
